instructions: Press and hold the Power button. On the screen, press and hold Power off. Tap Ok to reboot into Safe mode. Uninstall apps that are causing a problem: From the Home screen, swipe up, then tap Settings . Tap Apps & notifications > See all apps . Tap on an app, then tap Uninstall . Tap Ok to continue.
From the Home screen, swipe up, then tap Settings . Tap Apps & notifications > See all apps . Tap on an app, then tap Uninstall . Tap Ok to continue.
Press and hold the Power button. Tap Restart . Wait for the device to restart in standard mode.
